_header: In old Romance and stories as I read
_description: Generydes (Version B) — 6995 lines in rhyme royal stanzas

CamEmm405.First Lines:
…When he her saw he drew hym [ ]her commyng theder liked hym
                    [ ]yllMyrable than Anon hym ass[ ]d…
CamEmm405.Note: Fragments of 9 folios, written on both sides, damaged.
CamEmm405.Editions:
Stubbings,  Frank. 
             “A New Manuscript of Generydes.” 
             Cambridge Bibliographical Society Transactions
         10 (1993): 317-40: 317-40.

CamTCC1283.First Lines:
[In] olde Romans and storys as I redeOf Jude somtyme ther was a
                    nobyll kyng…
CamTCC1283.Last Lines:
…he graunt vs a place perpetuallIn paradise where all his
                    seyntes duell
CamTCC1283.Attributed Title:

                        37v)
